title: 0% Loading Screen Bug
body:
Hiya :)

In all the games I've played this patch, whenever I'm loading into a game the percentage marker next to EVERYONE (not just me) says 0%. It has nothing to do with everyone playing on bricks; it stays at 0% for about a minute, and them boom! we're suddenly in game. It doesn't rise, or anything. It just stays at 0%.

It's nothing game-breaking, though. Just thought you may want a heads up.

Thanks :)

replies.body: I need help.. it just says 0% .. and once everyone is loaded it rises. and sometimes it just goes directly into the game. i need help with this

Hey there,

Ive noticed this occasionally also, I normally experience this when I alt tab from the game during loading.

Does this occur in every single game you connect to?
Yes, every single game. But I'm not alt-tabbing at all. It just happens.

Quite odd.

It's possible this may be related to an issue with your firewall/connection.

Are you able to run through the [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for me just to verify that this is not the case?
